definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The adrenocortical response appears to parallel the severity of the burn .
sentences.chinese: 腎上腺皮質反應與燒傷的嚴重性是平行的。

sentences.english: One is lack of recognition of the seriousness of the problem.
sentences.chinese: 一個是對這個問題的嚴重性認識不足。

sentences.english: It features a modern dual-axis accelerometer to track the magnitude of your movements.
sentences.chinese: 它配備了現代雙軸加速度跟蹤的嚴重性你的動作。

sentences.english: The severity and the chronicity of the slips were graded.
sentences.chinese: 並對滑脫的嚴重性和慢性化程度進行了分級。

sentences.english: It is in vain, sir, to extenuate the matter.
sentences.chinese: 試圖低估事態的嚴重性是枉然的。

sentences.english: Chen Jiata began to notice the gravity of his son's situation.
sentences.chinese: 陳佳塔開始意識到問題的嚴重性。

sentences.english: This does not prevent disease altogether, but can reduce its severity.
sentences.chinese: 這雖然不能完全防止疾病，但能減少它的嚴重性。

sentences.english: However, Magistrate Tong ruled out suspending the sentence owing to the seriousness of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 不過，裁判官由於罪行的嚴重性不判決緩刑。

sentences.english: Torts may be classified according to the gravity of the fault of the wrongdoer.
sentences.chinese: 侵權行爲多半根據做壞事者過錯的嚴重性來分類。

sentences.english: Provides a multilevel switch to control tracing and debug output without recompiling your code.
sentences.chinese: 提供基於嚴重性級別的開關，用於控制跟蹤輸出。

sentences.english: As a result, policymakers persistently underestimated the severity of the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 結果，政策決策者固執的低估了危機的嚴重性。

sentences.english: The seriousness of signalling risk depends on how far along you are.
sentences.chinese: 信號風險的嚴重性取決於你還有多少時間。

sentences.english: The doctor's diagnosis confirmed the seriousness of Zhao Jiao's illness.
sentences.chinese: 醫生的診斷證實了趙嬌病情的嚴重性。

sentences.english: It also highlights the severity of the pollution along the coastal manufacturing belt.
sentences.chinese: 這還凸顯了沿海製造業帶污染的嚴重性。

sentences.english: Mrs. Thompson didn't wake up to the problem until she read it.
sentences.chinese: 直到現在，湯姆生夫人才意識到了問題的嚴重性。

definition: to lose one's job/unemployment/not to fulfill one's obligations/to neglect one's job/dereliction of duty
to misjudge/error of judgment/incorrect ruling/miscarriage of justice
to turn a blind eye to
bring order out of chaos/set to rights things which have been thrown into disorder
the gains do not make up for the losses (idiom)
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
